docs: Program for creating and interacting with prediction markets

instructions.name: buy
docs: Buy shares in a prediction market
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context for the instruction
* `bet` - Whether buying YES (true) or NO (false) shares
* `amount` - Amount of SOL to spend on shares

accounts.name: market
docs: The market account that will be updated

accounts.name: market_metadata
docs: The market metadata account that tracks voting statistics.
PDA derived from ["market_metadata", market]

accounts.name: market_voter
docs: The market voter account that tracks the user's vote.
PDA derived from ["market_voter", signer, market]

accounts.name: signer
docs: The user who is voting and paying for the transaction

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program, used for transferring SOL

instructions.name: initialize_market
docs: Initialize a new prediction market with a description
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context for the instruction
* `description` - Description of what this market is predicting

accounts.name: market
docs: The main market account that stores core market information.
PDA derived from "market" and the hash of the market description.
Space allocated includes 8 bytes for discriminator, Market struct size,
and length of the hashed description.

accounts.name: market_metadata
docs: The market metadata account that stores financial information about the market.
PDA derived from "market_metadata" and the market account's public key.
Space allocated includes 8 bytes for discriminator and MarketMetadata struct size.

accounts.name: signer
docs: The account that is initializing the market and paying for account creation.
This account must be mutable as it will pay for the account creation.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The Solana System Program, required for creating new accounts

instructions.name: sell
docs: Sell shares in a prediction market
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context for the instruction
* `bet` - Whether selling YES (true) or NO (false) shares
* `amount` - Number of shares to sell

accounts.name: market
docs: The market account that will be updated

accounts.name: market_metadata
docs: The market metadata account that tracks voting statistics.
PDA derived from ["market_metadata", market]

accounts.name: market_voter
docs: The market voter account that tracks the user's vote.
PDA derived from ["market_voter", signer, market]

accounts.name: signer
docs: The user who is selling their shares

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program, used for transferring SOL

types.name: Market
docs: Main account that stores core information about a prediction market

fields.name: description
docs: Description of the market question
This is used as part of the PDA seed for the market account

fields.name: status
docs: Current status of the market (Open or Closed)

fields.name: answer
docs: Final outcome of the market (true for Yes, false for No)
This is set when the market is settled

fields.name: initializer
docs: Public key of the account that created this market

fields.name: expected_resolution_date
docs: Expected resolution date of the market

types.name: MarketClosedEvent
docs: Event emitted when a prediction market is closed
This event is triggered when a market's status is changed from Open to Closed,
indicating that it is no longer accepting bets and is ready for settlement.
After closing, the market awaits resolution by an authorized resolver.

fields.name: message
docs: A human-readable message describing the event

fields.name: market_id
docs: The public key of the closed market account, as a string

fields.name: market_metadata_id
docs: The public key of the market's metadata account, as a string

fields.name: initializer
docs: The public key of the account that closed the market, as a string

types.name: MarketInitializedEvent
docs: Event emitted when a new prediction market is initialized
This event is triggered when the `initialize_market` instruction successfully
creates a new market and its associated metadata account.

fields.name: message
docs: A human-readable message describing the event

fields.name: market_id
docs: The public key of the newly created market account, as a string

fields.name: market_metadata_id
docs: The public key of the market metadata account, as a string

fields.name: initializer
docs: The public key of the account that initialized the market, as a string

types.name: MarketMetadata
docs: Account that stores financial information about a prediction market
PDA derived from "market_metadata" and the market account's public key

fields.name: total_yes_assets
docs: Total SOL invested in YES positions (in lamports)

fields.name: total_no_assets
docs: Total SOL invested in NO positions (in lamports)

fields.name: total_yes_shares
docs: Total number of YES shares issued to participants

fields.name: total_no_shares
docs: Total number of NO shares issued to participants

fields.name: total_rewards
docs: Total SOL in the rewards pool to be distributed to winners (in lamports)

types.name: MarketStatus
docs: Represents the current status of a prediction market

types.name: MarketVoter
docs: Account that tracks a user's position in a specific market
PDA derived from "market_voter", the voter's public key, and the market account's public key

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount of SOL (in lamports) that the user has invested

fields.name: vote
docs: The user's prediction (true = YES, false = NO)
